name: PATCH_asm-groups-group_id
description: **This endpoint allows you to update or change a suppression group.**

on-behalf-of.default: The subuser's username. This header generates the API call as if the subuser account was making the call.

group_id.description: The ID of the suppression group you would like to retrieve.

example.description: Suggestions for items our users might like.
example.name: Item Suggestions

description.description: A brief description of your suppression group. Required when creating a group.

is_default.description: Indicates if you would like this to be your default suppression group.

name.description: The name of your suppression group. Required when creating a group.

$ul: **description**: A description of the suppression group.
**id**: The id of the suppression group.
**is_default**: Indicates if this is the default suppression group. (default: false)
**name**: The name of the suppression group. Each group created by a user must have a unique name.
**unsubscribes**: The unsubscribes associated with this group.
